http.description: The HTTP(S) URL of the remote server. This is used to match HTTP remote URLs and also used as the 'base' URL for links to files.

ssh.description: The SSH URL of the remote server. This is used to match SSH remote URLs.

pattern.description: A regular expression to match on a remote URL. The captured groups are provided to the `http` and `ssh` templates.

http.description:
The template to build the HTTP(S) URL of the remote server.

Captured groups from `pattern` are made available via the `match` variable.

ssh.description:
The template to build the SSH URL of the remote server.

Captured groups from `pattern` are made available via the `match` variable.

pattern.description: A regular expression to match on the file name.

key.description: The key to add to the query string when the pattern matches.

value.description: The value to add to the query string when the pattern matches.

pattern.description: A regular expression that captures the file name and line selection from a URL.

file.description:
A template that provides the file name from the URL.

The regular expression match from 'pattern' is made available via the `match` variable.

fileMayStartWithBranch.description: Indicates that the extracted file name may start with the name of a branch because the branch appears as a file path in the URL and the end of the branch and start of the file name cannot be determined.

server.description: The templates that provide the base remote URLs.

selection.description: The templates that provide the selection range.

http.description:
A template that provides the base HTTP URL for remotes.

The matching server is made available in the `http` variable, and the regular expression match from 'pattern' is made available via the `match` variable.

ssh.description:
A template that provides the base SSH URL for remotes.

The matching server is made available in the `ssh` variable, and the regular expression match from 'pattern' is made available via the `match` variable.

startLine.description:
A template that provides the one-based line number that the selection starts from.

The regular expression match from 'pattern' is made available via the `match` variable.

endLine.description:
A template that provides the one-based line number that the selection ends at.

The regular expression match from 'pattern' is made available via the `match` variable.

startColumn.description:
A template that provides the one-based column number that the selection starts from.

The regular expression match from 'pattern' is made available via the `match` variable.

endColumn.description:
A template that provides the one-based column number that the selection ends at.

The regular expression match from 'pattern' is made available via the `match` variable.

settings.description: Settings to make available during all tests.

remotes.description: Tests for different types of remote URLs.

spaces.description:
A test for a file path that contains spaces.

The branch is always 'master' and the file is always 'src/path spaces/file spaces.txt'.

misc.description: (Optional) Additional tests for any scenarios that are not covered by the standard tests.

branch.description:
A test for creating a link using the current branch.

The branch is always 'feature/test' and the file is always 'src/file.txt'.

commit.description:
A test for creating a link using the current commit hash.

The commit hash is made available to the template via the `commit` variable, and the file is always 'src/file.txt'.
